Sara Fredman

Sara Fredman is a writer living in St. Louis. She holds a PhD in medieval English literature and is a prose editor for december magazine. Her work has appeared in Longreads, Slate, The Rumpus, Tablet, and Lilith

Tablet Magazine

"Is Midge Maisel a Bad Mom? A Feminist Query."

Longreads

"Himpathy for a Horse"
The Rumpus

"What the Hormone-Addled Cartoon Big Mouth Has in Common With Medieval Literature"
Slate

"Luke Perry and the Mishna: A Love Story"
Lilith

"The Blaming of the Shrew"
Longreads
